title: Ore ga Inmajutsu de Dorei Harem wo Tsukuru Hanashi - Novel Updates
tags: Futanari   Male Protagonist   R-18   R*pe   Transported to Another World
author: 黒水蛇
description:
An angel, demon, and human. An otherworld inhabited by demi-humans. One man was summoned there. A man was told by the demon-race to collect magical power, and the method of collection he chose was 「Rape」

What will become of the girls who fall into slave training…?>
